title: Raising The Zombie King - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Romance   Slice of Life   Yuri
tags: Apocalypse   Beautiful Female Lead   Mute Character   Strong Love Interests   Survival   Zombies
author: 半碗多糖
description:
In the eighth year of Apocalypse, after being left behind by her teammates for the seventh time, Lin You picked up a Zombie King.

She was quiet, harmless, and not ugly-looking.

Lin You decided to raise her.>
